Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
01.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
03.11.2012 GB SCR17663 Extended condition for selection with INUP_STORNO_FROM_INVO_NO = 0
06.09.2012 GB SCR17520 Changed condition for cal the part BAD300B
10.11.2011 JH SCR16876 Added condition to call of BAD300B
26.09.2011 GB SCR16770 Extended range for INUC_VALUEDATE (BAD300A)
01.09.2011 JH SCR16710 BAD300A Changed update of INUD_CHARGED
31.08.2011 JH SCR16710 BAD300A Changed parameter PI.CREDITINTEREST
26.05.2011 SH SCR16420 Added GB110.PO.VATC (not used)
22.04.2011 JH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
18.03.2010 GB SCR15367 Added the part BAD300C - Upfront status
19.11.2009 SH SCR15028 Added GB110.PI.COMMISSIONC = 0
17.07.2009 SH SCR14738 Added test INUP_STORNO_BY_INVO_NO = 0
13.02.2009 SH SCR14407 BAD300A/B diff. changes regarding RF-MF handling
05.11.2008 GB SCR14080 Added new condition CLNT614_INTERESTUPFRONT = Y
25.05.2007 SH SCR12544 Removed test INUP_SETLLED = N
30.04.2007 SH SCR12487 Redesigned BAD300B acc. to usage of temp table TIUB
24.04.2007 SH SCR12468 Changed transaction handling --> now INUP row
... use GNRL_DEBTORSLISTDATE if PI.DATE = null
BAD300C - Upfront status
INUP_FINALLY_PRINTED = Y only if INUP_SETTLED = Y
End BAD300C
-- Reset variables
-- 1. Calculate the interest
-- 2. Insert new INUD row with the correction amount
--3. Update INVOICE_UPFRONT
-- 4. Update INVOICE_UPFRONT_CHANGES
-- Recalculation of amounts
... update variables which uses in further steps
-- Store one TIUB row for fisrt day in calculation period (if not exist)
-- Store one TIUB row for last day in calculation period (if not exist)
-- GB110 has to be called with PI.DATEUNTIL = TIUB_CHANGEDATE -1 of the next
selected row (so with v.TIUB_CHANGEDATE(Previous) -1)
